goals__remit: Eurobits Technologies is a company incorporated by Bankinter and Caja Madrid in 2003 with the purpose of providing account aggregation services through the internet and other channels. In 2005 with the introduction of the Electronic Invoicing Service and an Electronic Benchmarking Service, our scope was widened to become a provider of advanced digital services. Our goal is to provide banks, public bodies and services companies best of breed account aggregation, electronic invoicing en electronic benchmarking services with the aim of bringing transparency and competition to the financial services sector.
